GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array containing a single article by id

exampleResponse.title: Another article about Mitch
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array containing all articles sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing all comments for a specified article_id sorted by date in descending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the given article, returns the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: modify the vote count on an existing article. Positive and negative integers are allowed

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the database
